website_summaries.verdict: A modern, mini laptop with built-in Google apps that convert easily for both professionals and students.
pros: Weighs in at about 2 pounds and comes with Intel Celeron N3060 processor
We also love that the battery life lasts up to 10 hours
cons: Doesn't accommodate high-design software, but is highly effective for communication purposes

customer_reviews.title: Great Chromebook.
customer_reviews.text: This is a durable machine. It has rubberized parts around the edges that provide a little more protection. It has pretty decent battery life, a nice screen, and good size. It's a really nice computer for getting online quick. When I purchased it the price was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Guy Buying Stuff

customer_reviews.title: This thing died after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: It died. It stopped working. No power. No nothing. $200+ dollars for six months of operation. Not happy!
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: microphone problem
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of this Chromebook for my kids to use for Zoom meetings with their school teachers. All their teachers complaint that they barely could hear my kids. I also used this Chromebook for Zoom with my work staffs, they complaint the same thing. I asked them to score 1-10, and I was told a 2. I checked the setting, but there is nothing really I can control on Chromebooks. What should I do?????
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: If you are a college student PLEASE do not buy
customer_reviews.text: this computer is horrible! Slow constantly skipping if you are a college student who have to do intense learning course please do not buy this laptop its not compatible with most apps I use for school or either the system is to old and its outdated this computer is a piece of junk I had to transition to take online courses due to covid and actually had to drop a course because I was on the verge of failing because this computer was not updated enough and accessible for my class logins and assignments PLEASE DO NOT BUY SAVE YOUR MONEY ...
customer_reviews.author: Beyond blessed

customer_reviews.title: 2 things I really like. 1
customer_reviews.text: bought this for my kid (7yo). 2 things I really like. 1. sturdiness 2. I can regulate what content she can access by using the google parental controls. Basically, I was able to create a child account under my own. And, then I can choose granular settings about what her account can/cannot access.
customer_reviews.author: Network Advisor

customer_reviews.title: Great for remote learning
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in March 2020 when my 10 yr old's school switched to remote learning. It is the same brand that he used at school so he already knew how to use it. We have had no issues with it and he is able to access email, video chats, and the internet to complete school work.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Funk

customer_reviews.title: Great Travel Computer
customer_reviews.text: Great little lap top purchased to use for a month long trip, nice small size. For the money its a good value would have liked touch screen but cost was almost double. Waterproof and built to withstand a drop off a desk or table.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy D

customer_reviews.title: great for just browsing the web and web-related functions
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, fast, attractive, great for just browsing the web and web-related functions. The touch pad can be a little sensitive. Good battery life. Only time will tell for reliability/durability.
customer_reviews.author: Wildflower

customer_reviews.title: Not good
customer_reviews.text: not a touch screen. The wifi sometimes drops for no reson and the on board mic is garbage. Had to buy something for school. Wish it wasn't this.
customer_reviews.author: Critical Reader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for distance learning
customer_reviews.text: Since the pandemic closed schools my son has been using this to do his school work.
customer_reviews.author: Deo

customer_reviews.title: slow comparing with other Acer  earlier Chromebooks with 4GB RAM
customer_reviews.text: Very slow comparing with other Acer 4GB RAM earlier Chromebooks. Quite disappointing. But cheaper though. Also, cannot install Android apps, not compatible.
customer_reviews.author: Lin

customer_reviews.title: Not as durable as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Teen daughter dropped it once screen cracked. Now it’s junk. Not as durable as advertised!! Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: R'Kenia Banks

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. The build quality is excellent for the price. Keyboard feels good and battery life is good too. Chrome OS takes a bit of getting used, but not bad at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gronne

customer_reviews.title: Great utility for middle schooler
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8th grader for school and she likes it fine. She really likes the color on it that makes it a little different than other chromebooks.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter for junior high. Long battery life. Color is nice. Met school requirements for chrome book.
customer_reviews.author: Jen Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice unit, quick boot, fast refresh, durable construction! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: Ed Ferrara

customer_reviews.title: Returned this item. Very slow on the internet,
customer_reviews.text: Returned this item. Very slow on the internet, kept freezing
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Chromebooks are more secure than Windows.
customer_reviews.text: It has Google playstore. You can also install other apk which are not in Google play store
customer_reviews.author: Iftekhar Chowdhury

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought it as a gift and was told it works great
customer_reviews.author: Hector Mendez

customer_reviews.title: Tough little laptop
customer_reviews.text: Tough little laptop that holds a charge and works for zoom meetings. No complaints
customer_reviews.author: Kari Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Makes a simple process more complicated. A step backwards.
customer_reviews.text: I bought one because I travel a lot and needed something that could take a beating. It seems tough but I do not understand why the manufacturers wanted to reinvent the way CAPSLOCK is used. You have to press 2 buttons together and wait 2 seconds to see the capslock icon. Typing should not have to be made more complicated, especially when you frequently have to write papers. I’m taking this thing back and exchanging it for a normal laptop.
customer_reviews.author: matt

customer_reviews.title: watch it
customer_reviews.text: after 1 yr laptop isn't working trying to find way to send back to company to make repairs
customer_reviews.author: sacksfd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Fast and simple to use. Just wish there was better streaming capabilities to my smart TV.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Hall

product_meta.title: Acer Chromebook 11, 11.6" HD, Intel Celeron N3060, 4GB LPDDR3, 16GB Storage, Chrome, CB311-7H-C5ED
product_meta.description: Acer Chromebook 11 CB311-7H-C5ED comes with these high level specs: Intel Celeron N3060 Dual-Core Processor 1.6GHz with Intel Burst Technology up to 2.48GHz, Google Chrome Operating System, 11.6" HD Widescreen LED-backlit Display, Intel HD Graphics, 4GB LPDDR3 SDRAM Memory, 16GB Internal Storage, 802.11ac Wi-Fi featuring MIMO technology (Dual-Band 2.4GHz and 5GHz), Bluetooth 4.2, HD Webcam (1280 x 720), 2 - USB 3.0 Ports, 1 - HDMI Port, 3-Cell Li-Ion Battery (4090 mAh), Up to 12-hours Battery Life, 2.98 lbs. | 1.35 kg (system unit only) (NX.GN3AA.001).
feature_bullets: Intel Celeron N3060 Dual-Core Processor (Up to 2.48GHz)
4GB LPDDR3 Memory, 16GB Internal Storage. IPS technology
Only with Google Chrome Operating System, no windows compatible

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars54 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
